title: Collaborative Learning-Based Distance Education for Strengthening Internet Business Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: In-service professionals collaborating with global learning communities in VR environments to solve actual business problems.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model marketing strategies through data analysis in a VR-based virtual corporate environment
Learners collaborate with team members via a collaborative learning platform to perform online business simulation tasks and incorporate real-time feedback
Learners apply knowledge gained through formative assessments to case studies, proposing ROI (Return on Investment) calculations and optimization strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
